message.item.moretinygates.tiny_nor_gate: Outputs to front when a signal isn't received from any side. (Negated OR gate)
message.item.moretinygates.tiny_xor_gate: Outputs to front when the input signals match.
message.item.moretinygates.tiny_nand_gat: Outputs to front when a signal isn't received to both left AND right side in the same time. (Negated AND gate)
